creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: burgandy and green cotton corte or ikat skirt woven on a foot loom in Totonicapan; ikat geometric designs appear in both directions; warp and weft in white and yellow; used as a gathered skirt, pulled by a cotton string, in the same style as in Quetzaltenango
title: Woman's skirt (Corte)
